name: Shadoobie.com
tag_list: big-data, visualization, purchase-data, mobile, data-transparency, yodlee, data-commons
overview:
Shadoobie is created as a consumer driven data content platform, it’s is an original idea to let users create and own their own data from everyday purchases.

Shadoobie creates data visualization as art and creates an environment of inspiration and social connection through everyday purchases. No pricing informations is shared and privacy is paramount - only the data is calculated by the transaction.

The image and location of your purchase is shared my millions as well as the weather. Our goal is that you could eventually be the advertiser or the brand ambassador for your own purchases!

On Shadoobie a toothbrush has the same value as a ferrari. its a data point on a chart. Shadoobie is about making your mark, tracking, analyzing and predicting the future. As a consumer you have the same information as wall street hedge funds you can participate or just watch and learn joining up with Shadooble will empower you and allow you to be part of a data co-op and benefit.

Join us today and be an influencer and an early adopter - have your name on the Shadoobie hall of fame!

Contact us we’d love to tell you more about what we’re working on!

contact@shadoobie.com
